text: If any person refuses to pay or deliver abandoned property to the Mayor as required under this chapter, the Mayor may bring an action in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia to compel such delivery.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 42-233.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-160, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 41-101.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon § 24 of the Uniform Disposition of Unclaimed Property Act (1966 Act). See 8A Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on WESTLAW.

DC CODE § 41-133

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Action to compel delivery of abandoned property.
